message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. It's not just an item; it's a testament to quality and craftsmanship. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. Considering its value and the effort put into it, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This exclusive offer is tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly remarkable. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
